articles.title: Top Nifty gainers and losers: SBI, Adani Ent regain, UPL, Asian Paints decline - Moneycontrol
articles.description: About 2598 shares advanced, 455 shares declined, and 91 shares unchanged.
articles.content: At the close, Sensex was up 634.65 points or 1.01 percent at 63,782.80, and the Nifty was up 190.00 points or 1.01 percent at 19,047.30. About 2713 shares advanced, 833 shares declined, and 123 share… [+2902 chars]
